listitem.para:
This option configures when &Libreswan; will send &X.509; certificates to the remote host. Acceptable values are:
yes always
always send a certificate
sendifasked
send a certificate when the peer asks for it (for instance by sending a CERTREQ payload)
no never
never send a certificate
The default for this option is always. Note that while always is suboptimal, setting this to sendifasked may break compatibility with other vendor's IPsec implementations, such as &Cisco;. If you find that you are getting errors about no ID/Key found, you likely need to revert this option to always.

This option was added in &Libreswan; 2.5.14; in &Libreswan; 2.28, the default was changed from sendifasked to always; and in &Libreswan; 3.0, the related and obsolete global option nocrsend= was removed.
